tasks.title: Complete Project Proposal
tasks.description: Draft and finalize the project proposal document for client review.

tasks.title: Meeting with Stakeholders
tasks.description: Conduct a meeting with project stakeholders to gather requirements and feedback.

tasks.title: Design Mockups
tasks.description: Create mockups and wireframes for the user interface.

tasks.title: Backend Development
tasks.description: Start developing backend functionalities based on project requirements.

tasks.title: Frontend Development
tasks.description: Begin implementing frontend components and features.

tasks.title: Testing Phase 1
tasks.description: Initiate testing procedures for completed functionalities.

tasks.title: Client Demo
tasks.description: Arrange and conduct a demo session with the client to showcase progress.

tasks.title: Refinement Phase
tasks.description: Address feedback from the client and refine the project accordingly.

tasks.title: Documentation
tasks.description: Document the project structure, functionalities, and usage.

tasks.title: Deployment
tasks.description: Deploy the finalized application to the production environment.

tasks.title: Client Review
tasks.description: Conduct a final review with the client and obtain approval for deployment.

tasks.title: Post-Deployment Support
tasks.description: Provide support and address any issues post-deployment.

tasks.title: Client Feedback Analysis
tasks.description: Analyze client feedback to identify areas for improvement.

tasks.title: Project Conclusion Report
tasks.description: Prepare a comprehensive report summarizing the project outcomes and lessons learned.
